title: Press Freedom Risk: Detentions During Protest Coverage
summary: Multiple journalist detentions reported during protest coverage across UP/HR/Delhi. Patterns suggest targeting near announced march locations.
risks: Chilling effect on coverage; reduced transparency
Escalation if arrests framed as national security
opportunities: Issue rights-preserving advisory for chapters & volunteers
Join statements with civil society on press freedom
Track detentions to inform legal support
recommendations: Set up incident intake form & escalation tree
